name: Mitigation Playbook for Application Layer Protocol Misuse
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker leveraged compromised credentials to send command and control traffic over HTTPS, utilizing a trusted application.

action--3e4d6eaf-8ec3-463e-9c1b-e991d7ed.name: Kill the suspicious application process
action--3e4d6eaf-8ec3-463e-9c1b-e991d7ed.description: Terminate the suspicious application if it is running.

if-condition--c1f78335-1c68-4d31-9a75-95.name: Check if the process was killed

loop--7f234bdd-0ad2-45a4-b66b-ef368a6915.name: Block outgoing traffic to suspicious IP
loop--7f234bdd-0ad2-45a4-b66b-ef368a6915.description: Block outgoing connections to the suspicious IP addresses until traffic is cleared.

action--7f234bdd-0ad2-45a4-b66b-ef368a69.name: Block outgoing traffic to suspicious IP addresses
action--7f234bdd-0ad2-45a4-b66b-ef368a69.description: Block network traffic to identified suspicious external IP addresses.

action--b8c79c11-755c-4936-88b1-fe4ce654.name: Conduct a full system scan
action--b8c79c11-755c-4936-88b1-fe4ce654.description: Perform a comprehensive system scan to identify any further compromises.

scan_result.description: The variable contains the scan report generated from the scan.
